parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of related entities to expand

post.description: Creates a new contact and assigns optional roles and document types in a single operation

400.description: Invalid request body or permission assignment failed

post.description: Creates a new primary contact in Dataverse linked to an organization and sends an invitation email by creating a user in Supabase. The user will receive an email with a link to set their password and verify their account.

201.description: Contact created and invitation sent successfully

example.message: Contact created and invitation sent successfully

400.description: Invalid email address - Supabase invitation failed

409.description: Contact with this email already exists

example.message: Contact with email john.smith@example.com already exists

get.description: Retrieves a contact from Dataverse by email and optionally returns organization info.
Retrieves a single contact from Dataverse by its unique contact ID (contactid). If no contact exists with the provided ID, a 404 Not Found response is returned.
Returns the current Dataverse configuration (without secrets)
Returns information about the current authenticated user
Returns information about the Dataverse environment

get.summary: Get submissions with primary contact relationship
Get submissions with document type, contact, and organization relationships

get.description: Retrieve the document attachment for a specific submission. Returns base64 encoded document data.

200.description: Document data with base64 content, or null if no document found

get.description: Retrieve all designees. Optionally filter by organization ID using query parameter.

200.description: List of designees with enriched document type names

get.description: Retrieve all designees for a specific organization with enriched document type information

200.description: List of designees for the specified organization

get.description: Retrieve a single designee by their unique identifier with enriched document type information

200.description: Designee details with document type name

get.summary: Get active document types for lookups
Get primary + supporting documents for a submission from Notes
Get attachments for a specific parent record
Portal view of attachments for a parent record
Get attachment by ID (includes file content)

post.summary: Upload file for a specific record
Portal file upload for a specific record

get.summary: Get complete account data with all lookup relationships
Get accounts with their primary contacts and related contacts
Get account by ID with primary contact and related contacts

put.summary: Set or clear the organization primary contact

delete.description: PROTECTED: Cannot delete State organizations or organizations with UID1/UID2. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true

get.summary: Public list of accounts for registration

post.description: Submit a registration request for a new organization. Validates organization type, checks for duplicates, and creates a pending registration request. Optionally attach supporting documents via multipart/form-data.

400.description: Invalid request data or validation errors

post.description: Submit a request to join an existing organization. Validates organization exists and creates a pending access request. Optionally attach supporting documents via multipart/form-data.
Use POST /register instead. This endpoint will be removed in a future version.

409.description: An organization with this name already exists

example.message: An organization with this name already exists

post.description: Add supporting documents to an existing registration request
post.summary: Upload supporting files to existing registration

post.description: Test document upload. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
post.summary: [TEST ONLY] Upload document to register record

post.description: Delete register records within timeframe. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
Delete accounts missing prv_uid1 or prv_uid2 within timeframe for a specific organization. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
post.summary: [TEST ONLY] Delete accounts missing UID codes

post.description: Delete submissions within timeframe for a specific organization. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
Delete Supabase users created within timeframe for a specific organization. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
Delete all contacts for a specific organization. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
Delete all designees for a specific organization. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
Returns count of all data associated with an organization (submissions, register records, contacts). Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true
post.summary: [TEST ONLY] Get data counts for organization

post.description: Delete all data within timeframe: submissions, register records, Supabase users, and organizations. When organizationId is null, deletes ALL records. When includeAllStatuses is false, only deletes pending register records. Only available when ENABLE_TEST_ENDPOINTS=true

get.summary: Get all roles for an organization
Get roles for a specific contact in an organization
Get organization contact role by ID
Get all documents for an organization
Get documents for a specific contact in an organization
Get organization contact document by ID

info.title: Pravia Flux API
info.description: Flux Microsoft Dataverse API for Pravia ecosystem

tags.name: Application
tags.description: Basic application information and metadata endpoints

organizationRoles.description: Organization roles assigned to the contact

organizationDocuments.description: Organization document types assigned to the contact

roleIds.description: Array of role IDs to assign to the contact

documentTypeIds.description: Array of document type IDs to assign to the contact

fullName.description: Full name of the contact (will be split into first and last name)

email.description: Email address of the contact - must be unique

organizationId.description: Organization ID (account ID) to link the contact to

roleIds.description: Array of role IDs to assign to the contact (null to leave unchanged, empty array to remove all)

documentTypeIds.description: Array of document type IDs to assign to the contact (null to leave unchanged, empty array to remove all)

documentUrl.description: Document URL (null when returning base64 data)

documentData.description: Document data with base64 content and metadata

primaryContactId.description: Contact ID to set as primary contact. Null removes primary contact.

orgCode.description: Organization code / UID1 (required for State entities)

govCode.description: Government code / UID2 (required for State entities)

parentOrganizationId.description: Parent organization ID (required for State entities)

deleteAll.description: Delete all statuses (default: false, only pending)

organizationId.description: Organization ID to cleanup. When null or omitted, deletes ALL organizations within timeframe.

includeAllStatuses.description: Include all register record statuses (default: true). When false, only deletes pending (448150002) records. When true, deletes all statuses (pending, approved, rejected).
